answers.answer: It could be PCOS. . . I've heard that taking 2 Cinnamon Pills a day can help  with the weight gain part (By helping your body fight Insulen Resistance) . . .

question: I have been married for last 1yr and am not able to concieve I consulted  a doctor she suggested ultra sound and some thyroid and diabetes tests all my tests are normal but my right ovary is a bit bulky its 19cc and some free liquid was also show in left ovary,i have this history of slightly irregular pain ful periods with some blood clots. And i am gaining alot of weight even regular exercise is not being helpful????Can someone please suggest me what is it indicating?
title: Bulky right ovary
